project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a specified CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns selected by the user.

task.name: Analyze user input to select numerical columns from the CSV file
Calculate the mean for the selected numerical columns
Calculate the median for the selected numerical columns
Calculate the mode for the selected numerical columns
Write tests for each of the analysis functions (mean, median, mode)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure their functionality
